level.heading: Reorganization.
level.text: The Director of the DMV is authorized to organize the personnel and property transferred herein within any organizational unit of the DMV as the Director deems appropriate. Until such establishment, existing orders establishing the components of the pre-existing Department of Public Works remain in force, where they do not conflict with this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary addition of chapter, see note to § 50-901.
For temporary (90-day) addition of Chapter 1A, see notes following § 50-901.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-175, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-901.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Application of D.C. Law 12-175: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-901.
